entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse What about trumps lies & cover-ups involving the #Coronavirus in America that cost 101,000 American lives? Your saying its ok for our president to lie to us in a way that directly harms Americans. Hopefully American voters feel differently in November.
